entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
